data.comment: The match is underway in Kashima.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 4, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima's Ryuji Izumi misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Can Kobe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Kobe are pushing forward but Yutaro Oda's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Andres Iniesta of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima's Ryuji Izumi is whistled for offside at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 19, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Dankler.
Leo Osaki instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 23, Kobe pushes forward through Yutaro Oda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
In the minute 25, Kashima advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kobe.
Leo Silva (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 35, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 38, Goal! Everaldo (Kashima) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Kashima.
Great play from Rikuto Hirose to set up the goal.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Hotaru Yamaguchi for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Kobe have a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Kobe's Yuta Goke misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Ryuji Izumi (Kashima) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Minoru Tojo awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 53, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashima.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Kobe at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Goal! Kobe have got their heads in front thanks to a Yuta Goke strike.
Gotoku Sakai with an assist there.
In the minute 63, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima just outside Kobe's area.
Andres Iniesta is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 65, Kashima's Leo Silva breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) has received a yellow card from Minoru Tojo.
Kobe make their first substitution with Keijiro Ogawa replacing Yutaro Oda.
In the minute 69, Thorsten Fink (Kobe) is making a second substitution, with Takuya Yasui replacing Yuta Goke.
Free kick Kobe.
Rikuto Hirose (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Kobe drive upfield and Andres Iniesta gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Juan Alano is replacing Leo Silva for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 73, Zago is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Itsuki Someno replacing Yasushi Endo.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Ryotaro Araki is on a sub for Ryuji Izumi for Kashima.
The home team replace Kento Misao with Ryota Nagaki.
Goal kick for Kobe at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 79, Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Kobe's area.
Throw-in Kobe.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, Kobe drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Sergi Samper is replacing Andres Iniesta for the away team.
The away team have replaced Dyanfrez Douglas with Noriaki Fujimoto. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thorsten Fink.
In the minute 83, Yuta Matsumura is on a sub for Rikuto Hirose for Kashima.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Kobe to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kobe.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, Minoru Tojo awards Kobe a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
At Kashima Soccer Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
The match has come to a close in Kashima. The final score is 2-2.
Takuya Yasui (Kobe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
So Fujitani is replacing Daigo Nishi for the away team.
Ryotaro Araki levels the score at 2-2.
